```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```
```{r}
LADHistory <- read_csv("data/LADTeamHistory.csv")
LADHistory2 <- read_csv("data/LADTeamHistory2.csv")
```
```{r}
LADHistory2 <- read_csv("data/LADTeamHistory2.csv")
LADHistory2 <- LADHistory2 %>%
  mutate(FranchiseName = (From + To) / 2, 
  FranchiseName = cut(Year,
                      breaks = c (1880, 1890, 1894, 1898, 1916, 1932, 1957, 2030),
                      labels = c ("Brooklyn", "Bridgegrooms", "Grooms",
                                  "Robins", "Superbas", "BK Dodgers",
                                  "LA Dodgers")))
```

```{r}
LADHistory2 %>% plot_ly(x = ~RA, color = ~FranchiseName) %>% add_boxplot() -> RABoxPlot
RABoxPlot
```
